meanings.definition: A lightweight fabric woven with white threads across a colored warp, typically used for shirts and dresses.
meanings.sent1: She wore a pretty chambrays dress to the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The store had a sale on chambrays shirts.
meanings.sent3: The chambrays fabric danced in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as light and airy as chambrays.
meanings.sent5: The chambrays material felt soft against her skin.

meanings.definition: To make a garment from chambray fabric.
meanings.sent1: She chambrays a lovely blouse for the party.
meanings.sent2: He chambrays a new shirt every summer.
meanings.sent3: The tailor chambrays with precision and skill.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity chambrays into beautiful designs.
meanings.sent5: Chambraying a dress requires attention to detail.
